name: js/components/box/index.js

unknown.tagValue:
Box is the class that contains the methods for all actions a Box
should be able to perform. It takes care of orchestring the chain of
events.

name: constructor
description: Constructor for the Light class

params.name: board
params.description:
this is the board class delivered
by johnny five for one board. In this case we talk about a photon board

params.name: client
params.description:
This is an  instance of an mqtt client that
will be used to communicate with oder boxes

params.name: options
params.description: Option containing next, prev and isMaster

name: board
description: A Johnny Five Board instance

name: client
description: An Mqtt client

name: options
description: Option with next, prev and isMaster

name: name
description: The Box's name

name: round
description: The round actually playing

name: translator
description:
The Translator component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: light
description:
The Light component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: motor
description:
The Motor component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: speaker
description:
The Speak component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: infrared
description:
The Infra component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: microphone
description:
The Micro component
Will be intialized when all boards are ready

name: onConnect
description: Is called when the Box's mqtt client is ready and connected.

name: onMessage
description: Is called when a mqtt message is received

params.name: topic
params.description: the mqtt topic the message was sent on

params.name: message
params.description: the message sent via mqtt

name: sendMessage
description: Send a message to wether the nex or the previous Box via mqtt

params.name: message
params.description: message to be sent to the sibling Box

params.name: recipient
params.description: wether "next" or "prev"

name: onBoardReady
description: Is called when the Photon board is ready

name: getClient
description: Retruns the Box's mqtt client

name: getBoard
description: Returns the Box's j5 board

name: start
description: Internal start, starts detecting

name: startTheShow
description: External start, intreases the round

name: restartTheShow
description: Restarts the complete show and resets the round

name: onPresenceDetected
description: Is called when the infrared detects a presence

name: onRulesExplained
description: Is called when the Box has spoken the rules out loud

name: prepareToSpeak
description: Is called when the Box is meant to speak

name: speakText
description: Speaks the text out loud

name: onRecordingFailed
description:
Is called when the voice was badly recorded, when no sound was identified
or when the speech could not be transformed into text

name: onTextSpoken
description: Is called whe the box has successfully spoken the text out loud

name: handleTranslation
description: Ends the show of the box

name: finish
description: Is called when the box finished its round

name: timeout
description: The component's timeout. Saved to be cleared at any time

name: onPreviousBoxSpeaking
description: Is called when the previous box is speaking the text out loud

name: isLastRound
description: Is called to check is this is the last round

name: allStandUp
description: A method to reinitialize the box to a standing state

name: reset
description: A method to reinitialize the box to the initial state

name: testMotor
description: A method to test that all components are connected and working correctly

name: delayedCall
description: A utility to delay an action returning a Promise

name: timeout
description: The component's timeout. Saved to be cleared at any time

name: js/components/infrared/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Infrared class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: board
description: Johnny Five Board instance

name: proximity
description: Johnny Five Proximity instance

name: distance
description: Actual detected distance in cm

name: presenceDetected
description: Wether or not a human presence is detected

name: throttledCheck
description:
A throttled function checking if a human presence
is still detected after a certain time

name: onData
description:
Is called when the infrared detects a distance. In other words,
all the time.

return.description:
Return a valid Johnny Five
instance of the Proximity class. See http://johnny-five.io/api/proximity/
for mor details.

name: detectPresence
description:
Is called to start the infrared detection. Overrides the global
resolve function with the Promise.resolve function.

name: resolve
description:
Resolve function to be triggered when a remaining presence
is detected

name: checkLaterIfStillPresent
description:
Checks if a presence is detected and resovles the Promise
if so. Resets the promise to its default.

name: timeout
description:
Timeout for rechecking if the presence is remaining
after a certain amount of time

name: js/components/light/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Light class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: led
description: The led light of the class (for now just one)

name: startBlinking
description: Is called to make the lights blink

name: stopBlinking
description: Is called to make the lights stop blinking

name: js/components/microphone/index.js
Microphone
description: A class managing the audio recording and turning soud into text

name: constructor
description: Class's constructor. Is called when initialized with the "new" keyword.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the box. Used to save the audio by Box name

params.name: language
params.description:
Language of the box. Used for speeching
                            and translating it later on

name: name
description: Name of the box. Used to save the audio by Box name

name: language
description:
Language of the box. Used for speeching
and translating it later on

name: startRecording
description: Records a voice, transforms the input into text and saves it

return.description: Is done when all operations are done

name: getAudioData
description: Retrieves all needed configs for the recording

params.name: index
params.description: Unique id for the record

name: reportAudio
description: Creates an audio report

params.name: index
params.description: Id of the report

return.description: Is done when the report is written

name: convertSpeech
description: Converts the audio input into text

params.name: audioData
params.description: [description]

name: js/components/microphone/records.js

unknown.tagValue: Handling the audio recording, specially the wav files

name: recordInput
description: Records the input in a wav file

params.name: options
params.description: The recording options

return.description: Is called when recorded and written in a file

name: js/components/microphone/reports.js
constructor
description: The class's constructor. Is called when initialized.

params.name: data
params.description: The audio file's data (wav)

name: data
description: The dataa of the audio record

name: newObject
description: The new audio report

name: writeJSON
description: Overrides a json report in a relevant file

return.description: Is done when the report is overriden

name: extendJSON
description: Extends an existing audio report

return.description: Is done when the report is extended

name: js/components/microphone/speechtotext.js

unknown.tagValue: A utility to tronsform audio files into text

name: constructor
description: The class's constructor. Is called whe initialized with the new keyword.

params.name: language
params.description: Language of the audio file to be converted

name: language
description: The language of the original speech (audio file)

name: getAccessToken
description: Returns the access token of the Api used to convert the speech into text

params.name: clientId
params.description: The Api's client id

params.name: clientSecret
params.description: The Api's client secret token

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be executed afterwards

name: convert
description: Converts the speech into text

params.name: filename
params.description: The file to take the text from

params.name: accessToken
params.description: The access token for the API

params.name: language
params.description: The language of the audio file

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to be called when done

name: js/components/motor/index.js
constructor
description:
Constructor for the Motor class. Needs a j5 board instance
to work well. !CAUTION¡ The j5 board must already be ready.

name: liftServo
description: The servo meant to lift the box up and down

name: tiltServo
description: The servo meant to make the box look up and straight

name: stands
description: Is the Box standing up?

name: titls
description: Is the Box looking up?

name: lieDown
description: Lifts the Box down

name: standUp
description: Lifts the Box up

name: lookUp
description: Makes the Box look up

name: lookStraight
description: Makes the Box look down

name: js/components/speaker/index.js
constructor
description: Has to be initialize with board information such as

params.name: name
params.description: Box's name for fiding the relevant text

params.name: language
params.description: Box's language to find the right voice

name: name
description: Box's name

name: language
description: Box's laguage

name: speakText
description:
Finds the relevant text in the file saved by the microphone component
and speaks it out loud

return.description: Is done when the whole text has been spoken out loup

name: say
description: Generic function speaking any text out loud with a given voice

params.name: voice
params.description: Any OSX preconfigured voice

params.name: message
params.description: Text to be spoken out loud

return.description: Is done when the text is completly recited

name: explainRules
description: Explains the rules of the game

return.description: Is done when all rules are told

name: getVoiceByLanguage
description: Find the relevant OSX voice by language

params.name: language
params.description: The wished language's voice (alpha2 code)

return.description: The relevant voice for the given language

name: sayNoRecordingError
description: To be called when the recording was unsuccessful

return.description: Is done when the error message has been told

name: catchError
description: Logs an error

params.name: err
params.description: The original Error

name: js/components/translator/index.js

unknown.tagValue: Class to translate audio texts into other languages

name: constructor
description: Class's constructor. Is called when initialized with the new keyword.

params.name: name
params.description: The Box's name to give the translation a name

params.name: language
params.description: The Box's language to know from what language to translate

name: name
description: The Box's name to give the translation a name

name: language
description: The Box's language to know from what language to translate

name: translateNext
description:
To be called to translate the audio text from on Box's language
to the next neighbour's language

params.name: next
params.description: The next neighbour's config

return.description: Is done when the translation is successful

name: translate
description: Generic translate function

params.name: sourceLanguage
params.description: The language to translate from

params.name: targetLanguage
params.description: The language to translate to

params.name: output
params.description: The message to translate

return.description: Is called when the translation is over

name: getTexts
description: Retrives the texts save in the file

return.description: With the file path and the texts

name: addTranslation
description: Adds a new translation to the texts file

params.name: response
params.description: Is done when the new translation is insterd in the file

name: js/constants/index.js
INFRARED_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the infrared class

name: LIGHT_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the light class

name: MOTOR_CONSTANTS
description:
All hardcoded values and constants
for the motor class

name: GENERAL_CONSTANTS
description:
General constant that could be used
anywhere in the source code

name: js/index.js

unknown.tagValue: Represents the whole chain of Boxes

name: constructor
description:
Initializes boards, mqqtt clients and starts the masterBox
automatically. Is not meant to be imported.

name: boxes
description: Collection of Boxes taking part to the show

name: masterBox
description: The first box to start the show, the one recoring

name: onAllBoardsReady
description:
Is called when all Johnny Five boards are ready.
Starts the event chain by calling start the show
on the master Box.

name: testMotor
description:
A utility method to test that all boxes are working
as expected. Uncomment the above comments to test

name: chain
description:
Automatically starts the chain by creating a new instance
of the BoardChain class

name: js/utils/boardsUtil.js

unknown.tagValue: Utility for handling Johnny Five boards

name: createBoard
description:
Returns a config for a Johnny Five board with an id and a Particle
Photon board

params.name: id
params.description: Any name you want to assign to your Photon board

params.name: deviceId
params.description: The Particle.io deviceId of you photon

name: js/utils/clientsUtil.js
createClient
description: Creates and returns a mqtt client with the give name

params.name: name
params.description: The same name as your Johnny Five board instance

return.description: An Mqqt client connected via shiftr.io

name: js/utils/logUtil.js
PREFIX_TABULATION
description:
Prefix intended to add a line break an tabulations in the
log messages to align them to the title
!CAUTION¡ Do not refactor because it look bad. It is intended
to be so !CAUTION¡

name: getFormattedTime
description:
Retrieves a formatted date like node does. Wraps the square
Brackets in a whote color with chalk to imitate the color
hilighting of oh-my-zsh

name: getColorByType
description: Maps logging types to colors for log hilighting

params.name: type
params.description: Wether info, hardware, shiftr, error, warning or discrete

return.description: The color associated to the type

name: doLog
description:
Parses an obtion object and logs whatever is gived to him in the
relevant color.

name: log
description: Log a formatted and hilighted message to the console

params.name: messageOrOptions
params.description:
Wether a sing sting
												 or an object containing
												 title, type and/or messages
